description: Describes the resource grouping recommendation tasks run by Resilience Hub for your application.

parameters.name: appArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: Error that occurred while generating a grouping recommendation.

nested_items.name: groupingId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the grouping recommendation task.
